notes.speech-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
TOPIC: how my generation is different from my parents' generation
differences:
my generation is less traditional (i.e., children no longer taking care of aging parents)
my generation is less obedient (i.e., children no longer accepting parents' decision about major)

check-list.item-text: I used careful planning to outline my response.
I began with an overall topic statement.
I used transitions to connect the supporting ideas.
